card.name: Abstract Iguanart
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, note the first letter of its artist's name. If that letter wasn't already noted, put a +1/+1 counter on Abstract Iguanart.

card.name: Acornelia, Fashionable Filcher
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with a squirrel in its art, you get {A} (an acorn counter). Whenever a Squirrel you control enters the battlefield or dies, you get {A}. {2}{B}, Pay X {A}: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. {2}{G}, Pay X {A}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Alexander Clamilton
card.text: Whenever you cast a wordy spell, scry 2. (A spell is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.) {1}{R}, {T}: Choose target creature you don't control. Reveal the top card of your library. Alexander Clamilton gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of lines of rules text on the revealed card. Alexander Clamilton fights that creature.

card.name: B.O.B. (Bevy of Beebles)
card.text: As B.O.B. (Bevy of Beebles) enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 blue Beeble creature tokens. The number of loyalty counters on B.O.B. is equal to the number of Beebles you control. (Create or sacrifice Beebles whenever B.O.B. gains or loses loyalty.) +1: Up to X target Beebles can't be blocked this turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand. −1: Draw a card.

card.name: Bat-
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, Augment {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Boomstacker
card.text: As Boomstacker enters the battlefield and whenever it attacks, stack two dice on top of it. (All dice must be stacked vertically, one on top of another.) Boomstacker gets +1/+1 for each die in its stack. Boomstacker attacks each combat if able. When the stack falls, sacrifice Boomstacker.

card.name: Flavor Judge
card.text: {T}: Choose target spell or ability that targets a permanent you control. Then ask a person outside the game if the story of what will happen makes sense. If they say no, sacrifice Flavor Judge and counter that spell or ability.

card.name: Infernius Spawnington III, Esq.
card.text: Flying, first strike, trample, haste This spell costs {3} less to cast for each card you've revealed this turn. When Infernius Spawnington III, Esq. enters the battlefield, you may say "I'm here." If you do, it deals 3 damage to target player.

card.name: Pippa, Duchess of Dice
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Roll a six-sided die. It becomes a green Die creature token with power and toughness each equal to its result. {2}{U}, {T}: Reroll any die. (Activate this ability only any time it makes sense.)

card.name: Rings a Bell
card.text: As Rings a Bell enters the battlefield, choose a word with four or more letters. After you say the chosen word for the first time each turn, an opponent may ring or imitate a bell within five seconds. When no opponent does, draw a card.

card.name: Spirit of the Season
card.text: When Spirit of the Season enters the battlefield, it gains haste if it's summer. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's autumn. You gain 5 life if it's winter. If it's spring, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stet, Draconic Proofreader
card.text: Flying Whenever Stet, Draconic Proofreader attacks, you may exile a card from your graveyard. When you do, Stet, Draconic Proofreader deals 4 damage to any target whose name begins with the same letter as the exiled card. {W}: Delete the first letter of target permanent or player's name until end of turn.

card.name: Strutting Turkey
card.text: When this creature enters the battlefield, exile target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard. if it has augment, combine it with a host you control. Otherwise, put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Surgeon ~General~ Commander
card.text: Whenever you augment, enchant, or mutate a creature you control, draw a card. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, {B}, {R}, or {G}.

card.name: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl
card.text: Knightlifelink (Damage dealt by Knights you control also causes you to gain that much life.) {W}: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate this ability only from sunrise to sunset. {B}: Syr Cadian, Knight Owl gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only from sunset to sunrise.

card.name: Timmy, Power Gamer
card.text: {4}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Underdome
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to pay silver-bordered costs.
